textContent:
Reminder: After an hour, you should stand up and walk a bit around. Better stop the music or put on different music for the break. Open your window, even if it's cold outside. Fresh air will make it better, trust me. 

Always see the positives in every situation

ITS NOT ABOUT CHANGING TO THE NEXT LEVEL BUT ABOUT SELF DEVELOPMENT
LEVEL CHANGE IS A BY PRODUCT
FOCUS ON SELF DEVELOPMENT

Kill them with kindness but strategically apply wickedness

create a world that favours you
not that which weakens you
(this shortness of living is yours after all)

- not comparing yourself to others (compare you from yesterday)
- Not trying to impress people (impress yourself from yesterday)

And yea often it takes the push to actually start the activity before the motivation comes, it’s about discipline not motivation bc if you wait to be motivated rather than having the discipline to start you’ll never start anything 

At The Very Least Accomplish Your Most Important Tasks
title: 100 Reminders
textContentHtml:
Reminder: After an hour, you should stand up and walk a bit around. Better stop the music or put on different music for the break. Open your window, even if it's cold outside. Fresh air will make it better, trust me. 


Always see the positives in every situation

not that which weakens you

(this shortness of living is yours after all)


- not comparing yourself to others (compare you from yesterday)

- Not trying to impress people (impress yourself from yesterday)


And yea often it takes the push to actually start the activity before the motivation comes, it’s about discipline not motivation bc if you wait to be motivated rather than having the discipline to start you’ll never start anything
